#include<iostream>
using namespace std;main(){int n,m[20],d[20][31],i,j,a;for(string N[20];cin>>n,n;){int c[31]={0},p[31]={0};for(i=n;i-->0;)for(cin>>N[i]>>m[i],a=j=0;j<m[i];c[d[i][j++]]++)cin>>d[i][j];for(;++i<n;p[a]==p[i]&N[a]>N[i]|p[a]>p[i]&&(a=i))for(j=0;j<m[i];j++)p[i]+=n+1-c[d[i][j]];cout<<p[a]<<" "<<N[a]<<endl;}}

import Control.Applicative ((<$>))
import Control.Monad (replicateM, unless)
import Data.List (foldl')
import Data.Vector.Unboxed (Vector, (!), (//))
import qualified Data.Vector.Unboxed as V

main :: IO ()
main = do
  n <- readLn
  unless (n == 0) $ do
    solve n <$> replicateM n (f <$> words <$> getLine) >>= putStrLn
    main
  where f (s:_:ls) = (s, map read ls)

solve :: Int -> [(String, [Int])] -> String
solve n xs = f . minimum . map (\(s, ts) -> (count ts, s)) $ xs
  where ph = foldl' (\h x -> V.accum (+) h [(x,1)]) (V.replicate 31 0) (concatMap snd xs) :: Vector Int
        count = sum . map (\t -> n + 1 - ph ! t)
        f (t, s) = unwords [show t, s]

loop do
    n = gets.to_i
    break if n == 0
    h = {}
    all_names = []
    n.times do
        name, _, *scenes = gets.chomp.split
        all_names << name
        scenes.each do |c|
            (h[c] ||= []) << name
        end
    end
    point = Hash.new(0)
    h.each do |_, names|
        names.each do |name|
            point[name] += n - names.size + 1
        end
    end
    n = all_names.min_by {|name| [point[name], name]}
    puts [point[n], n] * ' '
end

loop do
    n = gets.to_i
    break if n == 0
    h = {}
    n.times do
        name, _, *scenes = gets.chomp.split
        scenes.each do |c|
            (h[c] ||= []) << name
        end
    end
    point = Hash.new(0)
    h.each do |_, names|
        names.each do |name|
            point[name] += n - names.size + 1
        end
    end
    puts point.min_by {|name, k| [k, name]}.reverse * ' '
end

while n = gets.to_i
  break if n == 0
  h1 = Hash.new
  n.times do
    a = gets.split
    s = a.shift
    h1[s] = a.map(&:to_i)
    h1[s].shift
  end
  t = Hash.new(0)
  h1.each_value do |x|
    x.each { |v| t[v] += 1 }
  end
  h2 = Hash.new
  h1.each do |name, i|
    h2[name] = 0
    i.each { |j| h2[name] += n-t[j]+1 }
  end
  h2.sort
  ans = h2.sort_by { |k, v| v }.shift
  puts ans[1].to_s << " " << ans[0]
end

while (n = gets.chomp.to_i) != 0
  moments = Array.new(32){[]}

  n.times do
    line = gets.split

    line[2..-1].each{ |t| moments[t.to_i] << line[0] }
  end

  chars = {}
  moments.each do |t|
    p = n - t.size + 1
    t.each{ |name| chars[name] = (chars[name] ? chars[name]+p : p) }
  end

  ans = chars.sort{ |a, b| (a[1] == b[1] ? a[0] <=> b[0] : a[1] <=> b[1]) }[0]

  puts ans.reverse.join(" ")
end

### constant

MAX_D = 30

### main

loop do
  n = gets.to_i
  break if n == 0

  chrs = []
  diss = []
  dcounts = MAX_D.times.map{0}

  n.times do
    chr, m, *ds = gets.strip.split
    dis = ds.map{|d| d.to_i}

    chrs << [0, chr]
    diss << dis

    for d in dis
      dcounts[d] += 1
    end
  end
  #p dcounts

  for i in (0...n)
    for d in diss[i]
      chrs[i][0] += (n + 1 - dcounts[d])
    end
  end

  puts chrs.sort[0].join(' ')
end

while (n = gets.chomp.to_i) != 0
  moments = Array.new(32){[]}

  n.times do
    line = gets.split

    line[2..-1].each{ |t| moments[t.to_i] << line[0] }
  end

  scores = Hash.new(0)
  moments.each do |names|
    p = n - names.size + 1
    names.each{ |name| scores[name] += p }
  end

  ans = scores.to_a.map(&:reverse).min
  puts ans[0].to_s + " " + ans[1]
end

while n = gets.to_i
  break if n == 0
  h1 = Hash.new
  n.times do
    a = gets.split
    s = a.shift
    h1[s] = a.map(&:to_i)
    h1[s].shift
  end
  t = Hash.new(0)
  h1.each_value do |x|
    x.each { |v| t[v] += 1 }
  end
  h2 = Hash.new
  h1.each do |name, i|
    h2[name] = 0
    i.each { |j| h2[name] += n-t[j]+1 }
  end
  ans = h2.sort.sort_by { |k, v| v }.shift
  puts ans[1].to_s << " " << ans[0]
end

while n = gets.to_i
  break if n == 0
  h1 = Hash.new
  n.times do
    a = gets.split
    s = a.shift
    h1[s] = a.map(&:to_i)
    h1[s].shift
  end
  t = Hash.new(0)
  h1.each_value do |x|
    x.each { |v| t[v] += 1 }
  end
  h2 = Hash.new
  h1.each do |name, i|
    h2[name] = 0
    i.each { |j| h2[name] += n-t[j]+1 }
  end
  h2.sort!
  ans = h2.sort_by { |k, v| v }.shift
  puts ans[1].to_s << " " << ans[0]
end

<?php
$ans = array();
while ($n = trim(fgets(STDIN))) {
  if ($n == '0') { break; }
  $names = array();
  $displays = array();
  $displayCount = array();
  $points = array();
}

<?php
$ans = array();
while ($n = trim(fgets(STDIN))) {
  if ($n == '0') { break; }
  $names = array();
  $displays = array();
  $displayCount = array();
  $points = array();
  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    $arr = explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
    $names[$i] = $arr[0];
    $displays[$i] = array();
    $count = $arr[1];
    for ($j = 2; $j < $count + 2; ++$j) {
      $displays[$i][] = $arr[$j];
      $displayCount[$arr[$j]]++;
    }
  }

  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    foreach ($displays[$i] as $d) {
      $points[$i] += $n + 1 - $displayCount[$d];
    }
  }
  asort($points);
}

<?php
$ans = array();
while ($n = trim(fgets(STDIN))) {
  if ($n == '0') { break; }
  $names = array();
  $displays = array();
  $displayCount = array();
  $points = array();
  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    $arr = explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
    $names[$i] = $arr[0];
    $displays[$i] = array();
    $count = $arr[1];
  }

  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    foreach ($displays[$i] as $d) {
      $points[$i] += $n + 1 - $displayCount[$d];
    }
  }
  asort($points);

  $i = 0;
  $cur = -1;
  $targets = array();
  foreach ($points as $i => $p) {
    if ($cur > 0 && $p > $cur) { break; }
    $targets[] = $names[$i];
    $cur = $p;
  }
  sort($targets);
  $target = array_shift($targets);
  $ans[] = "$cur $target";
}
echo implode("\n", $ans);

<?php
$num = 0;
$all = 0;
while(true) {
  $k = trim(fgets(STDIN));
  if ($num != 0) {
    $ary = explode(' ', $k);
    $name = array_shift($ary);
    $count = array_shift($ary);

    $scores[$name] = $count * $all;
    foreach ($ary as $time) {
      if (empty($times[$time])) {
        $times[$time] = array();
      }
      $times[$time][] = $name;
    }

    --$num;
  } else {
    $all = $num = $k;
    $scores = array();
    $times = array();
    if ($all == 0) {
      break;
    }
  }
  if ($num == 0) {
    if (!empty($scores)) {
      foreach ($times as $time => $names) {
        $back = count($names) - 1;
        if ($back) {
          foreach ($names as $name) {
            $score[$name] -= $back;
          }
        }
      }
      arsort($scores);
      foreach ($scores as $name => $score) {
        echo $score . ' ' . $name . PHP_EOL;
        break;
      }
    }
  }
}

<?php
while ($line = trim(fgets(STDIN))) {
  list($N, $K) = explode(' ', $line);
  if ($N == 0 && $K == 0) {
    break;
  }
  $S = explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
  $yes = true;
  for ($i=0; $i<$N; ++$i) {
    $B = explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
    for ($j=0; $j<$K; ++$j) {
      $S[$j] -= $B[$j];
      if ($S[$j] < 0) {
        $yes = false;
        break;
      }
    }
  }
  if ($yes) echo "Yes\n";
  else echo "No\n";
}

$num = 0;

  $k = trim(fgets(STDIN));
  if ($num != 0) {
    $ary = explode(' ', $k);
    $name = array_shift($ary);
    $count = array_shift($ary);

    $scores[$name] = $count * $all;
    foreach ($ary as $time) {
      if (empty($times[$time])) {
        $times[$time] = array();
      }
      $times[$time][] = $name;
    }

    --$num;
  } else {
    $all = $num = $k;
    $scores = array();
    $times = array();
    if ($all == 0) {
      break;
    }
  }
  if ($num == 0) {
    if (!empty($scores)) {
      foreach ($times as $time => $names) {
        $back = count($names) -1;
        if ($back) {
          foreach ($names as $name) {
            $scores[$name] -= $back;
          }
        }
      }
      asort($scores);
      foreach ($scores as $name => $score) {
        echo $score . ' ' . $name . PHP_EOL;
        break;
      }
    }
  }
}

<?php
$output = array();

while (true) {

  $words = array();
  $times = array();
  $score = array();
  $minMember = array();
  $member = 0;

  // ?????°??????
  $member = trim(fgets(STDIN));

  // ????????????
  if ($member == "0") {
    break;
  }

  // ?????°??????????????°?????????
  for ($j = 0; $j < $member; $j++) {

    // ????????§??????
    $words = preg_split("/[\s]/", trim(fgets(STDIN)));

    // ???????????????
    $name = $words[0];

    // score?????????????????????????????????
    $score[$name] = 0;

    // ?¨??????????????????\?????????????????°????????????
    $kind = $words[1];

    for ($k = 2; $k < count($words); $k++) {
      // ????????£??????????????????
      $times[$words[$k]][] = $name;
    }
  }

  // ?????°?¨????
  foreach ($times as $key => $value) {

    $number = count($value);

    foreach ($value as $character) {
      $score[$character] += $member - $number + 1;
    }
  }

  // ????????¢????°????????????¢???
  $min = min($score);

  foreach ($score as $key => $value) {
    if ($min == $value) {
      $minMember[] = $key;
    }
  }

  // ????????????
  sort($minMember);

  // ??????
  $output[] = $min . ' ' . $minMember[0];
}

// ??????
foreach ($output as $key => $value) {
  print $output[$key] . PHP_EOL;
}

<?php
while ($n = trim(fgets(STDIN))) {
  if ($n == '0') { break; }
  $names = array();
  $displays = array();
  $displayCount = array();
  $points = array();
  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    $arr = explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
    $names[$i] = $arr[0];
    $displays[$i] = array();
    $count = $arr[1];
    for ($j = 2; $j < $count + 2; ++$j) {
      $displays[$i][] = $arr[$j];
      $displayCount[$arr[$j]]++;
    }
  }

  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    foreach ($displays[$i] as $d) {
      $points[$i] += $n + 1 - $displayCount[$d];
    }
  }
  asort($points);

  $i = 0;
  $cur = -1;
  $targets = array();
  foreach ($points as $i => $p) {
    if ($cur > 0 && $p > $cur) { break; }
    $targets[] = $names[$i];
    $cur = $p;
  }
  sort($targets);
  $target = array_shift($targets);
  echo "$cur $target\n";
}

<?php
$ans = array();
while ($n = trim(fgets(STDIN))) {
  if ($n == '0') { break; }
  $names = array();
  $displays = array();
  $displayCount = array();
  $points = array();
  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    $arr = explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
    $names[$i] = $arr[0];
    $displays[$i] = array();
    $count = $arr[1];
    for ($j = 0; $j < $count; ++$j) {
      $pt = $arr[$j + 2];
      array_push(&$displays[$i], $pt);
      $displayCount[$pt]++;
    }
  }

  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    foreach ($displays[$i] as $d) {
      $points[$i] += $n + 1 - $displayCount[$d];
    }
  }
  asort($points);

  $i = 0;
  $cur = -1;
  $targets = array();
  foreach ($points as $i => $p) {
    if ($cur > 0 && $p > $cur) { break; }
    $targets[] = $names[$i];
    $cur = $p;
  }
  sort($targets);
  $target = array_shift($targets);
  $ans[] = "$cur $target";
}
echo implode("\n", $ans);

  $displayCount = array();
  $points = array();
  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    $arr = explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
    $names[$i] = $arr[0];
    $displays[$i] = array();
    $count = $arr[1];
    for ($j = 0; $j < $count; ++$j) {
      $pt = $arr[$j + 2];
//      $displays[$i][] = $pt;
//      $displayCount[$pt]++;
    }
  }

  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    foreach ($displays[$i] as $d) {
      $points[$i] += $n + 1 - $displayCount[$d];
    }
  }
  asort($points);

  $i = 0;
  $cur = -1;
  $targets = array();
  foreach ($points as $i => $p) {
    if ($cur > 0 && $p > $cur) { break; }
    $targets[] = $names[$i];
    $cur = $p;
  }
  sort($targets);
  $target = array_shift($targets);
  $ans[] = "$cur $target";
}
echo implode("\n", $ans);

  $names = array();

    $names[$i] = $arr[0];
    $displays[$i] = array();
    $count = $arr[1];
    for ($j = 2; $j < $count + 2; ++$j) {
      $displays[$i][] = $arr[$j];
      $displayCount[$arr[$j]]++;
    }
  }

  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {

// Here your code !
$inputs = '4
akzakr 2 1 8
fnmyi 5 2 3 4 6 9

yskwcnt 6 3 4 7 8 9 10
4
akzakr 1 2
fnmyi 3 10 11 12
tsnukk 2 1 8
yskwcnt 2 1 8
5
knmmdk 2 13 19
akmhmr 4 13 15 19 22
mksyk 6 3 7 12 13 15 19
skrkyk 3 1 4 8
tmemm 3 1 17 24
5
knmmdk 5 5 6 16 18 26
akmhmr 9 3 4 7 11 14 15 17 18 20
mksyk 5 6 13 25 27 28
skrkyk 4 3 16 23 24
tmemm 3 6 12 20
14
hrkamm 6 4 6 8 10 20 22
mkhsi 6 1 10 12 15 22 27
hbkgnh 2 4 9
chyksrg 8 3 4 12 15 16 20 25 28
mktkkc 6 0 1 8 15 17 20
tknsj 6 6 8 18 19 25 26
yyitktk 3 3 12 18
ykhhgwr 5 3 9 10 11 24
amftm 7 2 6 8 12 13 14 17
mmftm 4 6 12 16 18
rtkakzk 3 14 15 21
azsmur 7 1 2 4 12 15 18 20
iormns 2 4 20
ktrotns 6 7 12 14 17 20 25
14
hrkamm 2 4 21
mkhsi 6 2 3 8 11 18 20
hbkgnh 4 4 16 28 29
chyksrg 5 0 3 9 17 22
mktkkc 2 7 18
tknsj 3 3 9 23
yyitktk 3 10 13 25
ykhhgwr 2 18 26
amftm 3 13 18 22
mmftm 4 1 20 24 27
rtkakzk 2 1 10
azsmur 5 2 5 10 14 17
iormns 3 9 15 16
ktrotns 5 7 12 16 17 20
0';

$inputsTemp = explode(PHP_EOL, $inputs);
$inputsTemp2 = array();
$values = array();
$name = array();
$appearTimes = array();

$scoreMap = array();
$scores = array();
$characters = array();
$key = 0;
foreach ($inputsTemp as $line => $input) {
    if ($input == 0) {
        break;
    } else if (is_numeric($input)) {
        $characters[$key] = $input;
        $key++;
        continue;
    }
    $inputsTemp2[$key][$line] = explode(' ', $input);
    $name[$key][$line] = $inputsTemp2[$key][$line][0];
    unset($inputsTemp2[$key][$line][0], $inputsTemp2[$key][$line][1]);
    if (!isset($values[$key])) {
        $values[$key] = array();
    }
    $values[$key] = array_merge($values[$key], $inputsTemp2[$key][$line]);
    $scores[$key][$line] = 0;
}
foreach ($values as $key => $val) {
    $appearTimes[$key] = array_count_values($val);
}
foreach ($appearTimes as $key => $times) {
    foreach ($times as $key2 => $time) {
        if ($time == 1) {
            $scoreMap[$key][$key2] = $characters[$key];
        } else {
            $scoreMap[$key][$key2] = $characters[$key] - $time + 1;
        }
    }
}

foreach ($inputsTemp2 as $line => $times) {
    foreach ($times as $time) {
        $scores[$line] += $scoreMap[$time];
    }
}
$minScore = min($scores);
echo $minScore . ' ';
$echoMember = array();
foreach ($scores as $key => $score) {
    if ($minScore == $score) {
        $echoMember[] = $name[$key];
    }
}
asort($echoMember); // ????????????????????????
foreach ($echoMember as $member) {
    echo $member;
}

while ($n = trim(fgets(STDIN))) {
  if ($n == '0') { break; }
  $names = array();
  $displays = array();
  $displayCount = array();
  $points = array();
  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    $arr = explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
    $names[$i] = $arr[0];
    $displays[$i] = array();
    $count = $arr[1];
    for ($j = 2; $j < $count + 2; ++$j) {
      $displays[$i][] = $arr[$j];
      $displayCount[$arr[$j]]++;
    }
  }

  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    foreach ($displays[$i] as $d) {
      $points[$i] += $n + 1 - $displayCount[$d];
    }
  }
  asort($points);

  $i = 0;
  $cur = -1;
  $targets = array();
  foreach ($points as $i => $p) {
    if ($cur > 0 && $p > $cur) { break; }
    $targets[] = $names[$i];
    $cur = $p;
  }
  sort($targets);
  $target = array_shift($targets);
  echo "$cur $target\n";
}

<?php
$num = 0;
$all = 0;
while(true) {
  $k = trim(fgets(STDIN));
  if ($num != 0) {
    $ary = explode(' ', $k);
    $name = array_shift($ary);
    $count = array_shift($ary);

    $scores[$name] = $count * $all;
    foreach ($ary as $time) {
      if (empty($times[$time])) {
        $times[$time] = array();
      }
      $times[$time][] = $name;
    }

    --$num;
  } else {
    $all = $num = $k;
    $scores = array();
    $times = array();
    if ($all == 0) {
      break;
    }
  }
  if ($num == 0) {
    if (!empty($scores)) {
      foreach ($times as $time => $names) {
        $back = count($names) -1;
        if ($back) {
          foreach ($names as $name) {
            $scores[$name] -= $back;
          }
        }
      }
      asort($scores);
      foreach ($scores as $name => $score) {
        echo $score . ' ' . $name . PHP_EOL;
        break;
      }
    }
  }
}

<?php
$num = 0;
$all = 0;
while(true) {
  $k = trim(fgets(STDIN));
  if ($num != 0) {
    $ary = explode(' ', $k);
    $name = array_shift($ary);
    $count = array_shift($ary);

    $scores[$name] = $count * $all;
    foreach ($ary as $time) {
      if (empty($times[$time])) {
        $times[$time] = array();
      }
      $times[$time][] = $name;
    }

    --$num;
  } else {
    $all = $num = $k;
    $scores = array();
    $times = array();
    if ($all == 0) {
      break;
    }
  }
  if ($num == 0) {
    if (!empty($scores)) {
      foreach ($times as $time => $names) {
        $back = count($names);
        if ($back > 1) {
          foreach ($names as $name) {
            $scores[$name] -= $back;
          }
        }
      }
      asort($scores);
      foreach ($scores as $name => $score) {
        echo $score . ' ' . $name . PHP_EOL;
        break;
      }
    }
  }
}

$ans = array();
while ($n = trim(fgets(STDIN))) {
  if ($n == '0') { break; }
  $names = array();
  $displays = array();
  $displayCount = array();
  $points = array();
  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    $arr = explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
    $names[$i] = $arr[0];
    $displays[$i] = array();
    $count = $arr[1];
    for ($j = 0; $j < $count; ++$j) {
//      $pt = $arr[$j + 2];
     $pt = 0;
      $displays[$i][] = $pt;
      $displayCount[$pt]++;
    }
  }

  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    foreach ($displays[$i] as $d) {
      $points[$i] += $n + 1 - $displayCount[$d];
    }
  }
  asort($points);

  $i = 0;
  $cur = -1;
  $targets = array();
  foreach ($points as $i => $p) {
    if ($cur > 0 && $p > $cur) { break; }
    $targets[] = $names[$i];
    $cur = $p;
  }
  sort($targets);
  $target = array_shift($targets);
  $ans[] = "$cur $target";
}
echo implode("\n", $ans);

<?php
$num = 0;
$all = 0;
while(true) {
  $k = trim(fgets(STDIN));
  if ($num != 0) {
    $ary = explode(' ', $k);
    $name = array_shift($ary);
    $count = array_shift($ary);

    $scores[$name] = $count * $all;
    foreach ($ary as $time) {
      if (empty($times[$time])) {
        $times[$time] = array();
      }
      $times[$time][] = $name;
    }

    --$num;
  } else {
    $all = $num = $k;
    $scores = array();
    $times = array();
    if ($all == 0) {
      break;
    }
  }
  if ($num == 0) {
    if (!empty($scores)) {
      foreach ($times as $time => $names) {
        $back = count($names) -1;
        if ($back) {
          foreach ($names as $name) {
            $scores[$name] -= $back;
          }
        }
      }
      asort($scores);
      foreach ($scores as $name => $score) {
        echo $score . ' ' . $name . PHP_EOL;
        break;
      }
    }
  }
}

<?php
$ans = array();
while ($n = trim(fgets(STDIN))) {
  if ($n == '0') { break; }
  $names = array();
  $displays = array();
  $displayCount = array();
  $points = array();
  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    $arr = explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
    $names[$i] = $arr[0];
    $displays[$i] = array();
    $count = $arr[1];
    for ($j = 0; $j < $count; ++$j) {
      $pt = $arr[$j + 2];
//      array_push(&$displays[$i], $pt);
      $displayCount[$pt] += 1;
    }
  }

  for ($i = 0; $i < $n; ++$i) {
    foreach ($displays[$i] as $d) {
      $points[$i] += $n + 1 - $displayCount[$d];
    }
  }
  asort($points);

  $i = 0;
  $cur = -1;
  $targets = array();
  foreach ($points as $i => $p) {
    if ($cur > 0 && $p > $cur) { break; }
    $targets[] = $names[$i];
    $cur = $p;
  }
  sort($targets);
  $target = array_shift($targets);
  $ans[] = "$cur $target";
}
echo implode("\n", $ans);

# AOJ 1074: Popularity Estimation
# Python3 2018.7.10 bal4u

while True:
	n = int(input())
	if n == 0: break
	f, tbl = [0]*31, []
	for i in range(n):
		a = input().split()
		nm = a.pop(0)
		m = int(a.pop(0))
		d = list(map(int, a))
		tbl.append([0, nm, d])
		for i in d: f[i] += 1
	for i in range(n):
		for j in tbl[i][2]: tbl[i][0] += n-f[j]+1
	tbl.sort(key=lambda x:(x[0],x[1]))
	print(tbl[0][0], tbl[0][1])
